name: Solve & Roll
description:
Download and try the free demo! Try the first 20 levels for free!

Make clever use of shapes by building bridges, towers, ramps, loops, slides, catapults, and more, all to guide a little green ball to a shiny gold star.

Place the shapes correctly to reveal the satisfying solutions to over 200 clever physics puzzles, ranging from the pleasingly simple to the deeply challenging. Can you solve them all?

• Over 200 puzzles await you in the full game
• Minimalist art style and a super clean interface – it's just you and the puzzle
• A light-on-dark colour scheme to help decrease eye strain
• Light, cheery piano jazz music and pleasant sound effects
• Hints are available to guide you if you get stuck

Why Will You Love Solve and Roll?

Solve & Roll can help enhance your short-term memory, problem-solving skills, and speed of thought, as you consider weight, speed, distance, drop height, balance, and timing to find solutions.

Solve & Roll does not contain advertisements or unnecessary gameplay elements, so you can focus entirely on solving puzzles. This can help bring you into a calm, peaceful, or meditative state of mind as you sit back, relax, and focus on enjoying the game.

17 languages!

English / French / German / Spanish / Swedish / Italian / Russian / Turkish / Portuguese (Brazil) / Japanese / Traditional Chinese / Simplified Chinese / Korean / Hindi / Indonesian / Arabic / Vietnamese /

We Love Feedback!

How can we improve Solve & Roll for you? Please email us at support@solveandrollgame.com if you have any suggestions or questions. With your support and invaluable feedback we can make this game and our future projects the best they can be.

Thank you for playing!
